title: Senior C++ Developer – Mechatronics & Instrument Integration
description:
At Veracio, we’re unlocking the value and utility of scarce resources, and it all starts with the orebody. Whether that’s unlocking hard-to-find minerals that are critical for a sustainable future. Or liberating time through the automation workflows from exploration through to production geoscience. Or the workforce, with cloud connected systems keeping the world’s brightest minds at your fingertips. It’s through a fusion of science and technology that we’re helping miners leverage their orebody knowledge to realize more opportunities while mitigating the social and environmental impact of their decisions.  

  

About the Role:  

We are seeking a highly skilled Senior C++ Developer with a background in mechatronics to join our team developing advanced analytical instruments for drill core analysis in the mining industry. This role requires hands-on work with integrated hardware systems, including the development of drivers, visualization tools, and data analysis routines.


You will be instrumental in integrating new hardware into our existing platforms, improving and extending current functionality, and contributing to the research and development of next-generation systems.


Key Responsibilities:

* Design, implement, and maintain high-performance C++ code for instrument control and data handling.
* Integrate new hardware components (sensors, actuators, optics, cameras) into existing systems.
* Develop drivers and communication protocols for custom and off-the-shelf components.
* Build visualization and diagnostic tools to support internal testing and client use.
* Contribute to data analysis and signal processing routines.
* Participate in R&D initiatives to shape future hardware/software platforms.
* Collaborate closely with hardware engineers, software developers, and field operators.


Required Qualifications:

* 5+ years of professional experience in C++ development.
* Solid background in mechatronics, embedded systems, or hardware-oriented software.
* Strong debugging skills and familiarity with hardware–software interaction.
* Comfortable working physically close to lab instrumentation and mechanical systems.
* Fluent in English, both written and spoken.


Preferred / Bonus Qualifications:

* Experience with ROS (Robot Operating System).
* Background in automation engineering and PLC programming.
* Familiarity with sensors, machine vision, motion control, or similar systems.
* Experience in scientific instrumentation or industrial equipment integration.


What We Offer:

* A key role in a growing team developing world-class technology for the mining industry.
* Opportunities to work hands-on with cutting-edge hardware and field-deployed systems.
* A collaborative, multidisciplinary work environment with room for innovation.
* Impactful work contributing to sustainable and efficient mineral exploration.

**Company Overview**  

Veracio is a wholly owned subsidiary of Boart Longyear with a principal focus on orebody knowledge and technologies for mining. Veracio leverages artificial intelligence and advanced analytics to accelerate real-time decision making and significantly lower the cost of mineral exploration. Bringing together over 100 years of heritage in mining equipment, tooling and services with a passion for cutting-edge science and technology. A passion that’s purpose-built to challenge the status-quo and encourage miners all over the world to think with a bigger vision, work with smarter data and strive to achieve a smaller footprint.  

  

#veracio
company_description: Boart Longyear is the world’s leading provider of drilling services, drilling equipment and performance tooling for mining and drilling.

title: Software Developer
description:
**ROLLEN**


Som mjukvaruingenjör hos Scanreco kommer du att spela en central roll i att stärka vår utvecklingsavdelning inom inbyggda, säkerhetskritiska realtidssystem. Du blir en nyckelspelare i vårt tighta och prestigelösa team, där du får möjlighet att påverka både produkter och resultat genom tydlig målstyrning och nära kundsamarbete. Här får du se direkt hur ditt arbete gör skillnad och bidrar till företagets framgång.


Vi arbetar med C-programmering och du kommer att vara delaktig i hela produktutvecklingskedjan. Vår tekniska miljö omfattar flera olika processorplattformar, från 8- till 32-bitar, och en stor del av arbetet innebär C-embeddedprogrammering där vi bygger från grunden. Du kommer att vara med både när vi skapar nya produkter och uppdaterar befintliga.


Initialt får du en introduktion och stöd från erfarna kollegor i teamet. Vårt mål är att du på lång sikt ska bli så självgående som möjligt och kunna ta dig an hela produktutvecklingsprocessen.

**TEAMET**


Du kommer jobba i vårt mjukvaruteam, som ingår i företagets utvecklingsavdelning. Mjukvaruteamet jobbar nära andra R&D team inom hårdvara, mekanik, verifiering samt produktionstest.


**KVALIFIKATIONER**


Vi tror att programmering är ett hantverk som kan tillämpas över olika programmeringsspråk och plattformar. De program som rör denna tjänst är skrivna i framför allt C men vi ser kunskaper inom andra områden som exempelvis kommunikationsbussar, CAN-protokoll och Linux-programmering som en fördel, inte en förutsättning. Vi förväntar oss att rätt kandidat har ett stort teknikintresse och därför lär sig snabbt.


Vi söker främst dig med viljan och ambitionen att utvecklas. Vad som är viktigt för oss är att du är genuint intresserad av hårdvarunära kod och kan se det större sammanhanget. Du är inte främmande för en lödkolv och kommunikationsbussar såsom CAN, SPI, UART, I2c samt att läsa elscheman.

*I denna tillsättning använder vi vår rekryteringspartner Detechtiv, vid frågor kontakta Jesper på jesper@detechtive.se (+46 790 990 860).*

title: Senior Javautvecklare i Östergötland
description:
*Vi utmanar de traditionella konsultbolagen och vi kan med stolthet säga att Castra är konsultbranschens mest utvecklande arbetsplats där allt är möjligt. Känns det här som företaget för dig så läs gärna vidare.*

**Rollen**


I rollen som Senior Javautvecklare hos oss kommer du att arbeta med moderna, skalbara och robusta system i en innovativ teknisk miljö. Du kommer att spela en nyckelroll hos våra kunder i att designa, utveckla och optimera applikationer som är molnbaserade och containeriserade.


Som konsult hos oss får du chansen att arbeta med spännande uppdrag inom både den privata och offentliga sektorn. Du har möjligheten att själv påverka din tid, utveckling, lön, pension, semester och val av uppdrag, här formar du din egen framtid!

**Erfarenhet**

* Minst 10 års erfarenhet av Java.
* Vana av att arbeta inom Cloud exempelvis (GCP, AWS eller Azure).
* Vana av att arbeta med containermiljö.
* Meriterande om du arbetat inom front end (JavaScript med ex Angular/Vue/React).
* God kommunikationsförmåga för att samarbeta med olika intressenter.

**Varför ska du välja oss?**


Här tror vi på frihet, möjligheter och medbestämmande. Att du som medarbetare ska ha möjlighet att utvecklas och forma ditt arbete utefter dina intressen och prioriteringar i livet. Att alla får vara med och forma och påverka bolaget genom delägarskap, advisory board och projektgrupper. Att det är viktigt att ha ett sammanhang, känna tillhörighet och att man har kollegor som stöttar, utvecklar och tror på en.

**Om Castra**

Castra är en entreprenörsdriven konsultgrupp inom IT, management och systemutveckling. Bolaget ägs gemensamt av medarbetarna och tillsammans bygger vi det företag vi själva vill jobba på.


Vår vision är att vi ska vara Sveriges bästa arbetsgivare för konsulter. Att vi blivit certifierade av Great Place to Work fem år i rad och vunnit de två senaste åren är ett bevis på våra höga mål kring företagskultur. Våra tankar om delaktighet, påverkansmöjligheter och respekt för individens egna val och möjligheter fungerar.


Företaget har kontor i Linköping, Norrköping, Örebro och Jönköping, Göteborg, Stockholm, Helsingborg och Malmö. Mer information om Castra-koncernen hittar du på vår hemsida www.castra.se.

**Har vi lyckats väcka din nyfikenhet?** Sök direkt via länken eller kontakta


Ebba Olofsson ebba.olofsson@castra.se


Christoffer Westrin christoffer.westrin@castra.se

Castra Mellansverige växer och vi söker dig som vill vara med på resan. Vi söker nu en Fullstackutvecklare som vill arbeta på distans.

Låter detta som du? Skicka in ditt CV redan idag!


**Det bästa åt de bästa – vår personalfilosofi**

  

Castra är en konsultgrupp inom IT och management. Eller ja, en elite-squad kan man säga. Vi samlar de vassaste och mest erfarna konsulterna, helt enkelt för att det är hos oss de får ut max i både kapacitet och livskvalitet.


Vi är en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser. Det låter lite skrytsamt, förlåt. Men det är faktiskt inte vi som sagt det. Castra har sedan 2017 blivit certifierad av Great Place to Work och har de senaste fyra åren blivit utnämnda till en av Sveriges Bästa Arbetsplatser. Som grädde på moset är vi även ett Gasell- och Karriärföretag.


På Castra tror vi på frihet, utveckling och gemenskap. Du som konsult styr själv vilka uppdrag du tar, när du jobbar, om du vill levla upp någon kompetens och hur och mycket lön och semester du tar ut. Att du får bygga din egen logga är bara ytterligare ett bevis. Trodde du det var allt? Då trodde du fel. Stöd av bra chefer, aktiviteter, kompetent och snabbfotad säljstyrka, egen upphandlingsenhet, möjlighet till delägarskap, stora möjligheter att påverka bolagets framtid och härliga kollegor – listan på vad som gör Castra till en fantastisk arbetsplats kan göras lååång. Summan av kardemumman är att hos oss är möjligheterna väldigt nära oändliga. Win win för alla parter, säger vi.


Castra har kontor i Örebro, Karlstad, Linköping, Norrköping, Jönköping, Göteborg, Stockholm, Malmö och Sundsvall. Mer information om Castra-koncernen hittar du på vår hemsida https://www.castra.se/om-oss/

title: Senior Software Developer
description:
##### **More independence, freedom, and better pay**


Coody believes in combining the freedom and flexibility of freelancing with the security of traditional employment.


It's not rocket science.


Overpaid managers, fancy offices, and heavily burdened organizations are history.


The tech talent of tomorrow deserves a new, independent, and well-paid standard.


Welcome to what we call Gravity Free Consulting.

##### **Why Coody**


At Coody, we cut out everything unnecessary to give more back to you as a consultant. And we have done it in the package of a slimmed and efficient organization, meaning no overpaid managers, no fancy offices and no luxurious conferences. But, what does this mean in practice?

**Maximized Compensation** - Typically a +40% salary increase.

**Freedom & Flexibility** - No bosses. All digital. Fully remote for those who prefer.

**Employment Security** - Fixed salary, pension, insurance, paid vacation and a big educational fund.

**Shaping the Future** - Projects and assignments for digital game changes like Mojang, Spotify, Volumental, Volvo Cars, Varjo, Toca Boca, Hemnet, and exciting startups and scaleups.

##### **This is Coody**


We’re a diverse community of ambitious tech people from more than 14 nationalities working on exciting challenges with customers across Sweden, Finland, USA, and the UK in industries ranging from gaming, AR, EV, AI, Medtech and Fintech.


Coody is more of a platform than a traditional consultancy. Everything we do, we do to make sure individuals working here can live according to their own priorities and unique ambitions. A consultant-first environment where you have better control over your career.


Explore our **Employee Handbook** and discover a company that actually puts consultants first.

##### **What you’ll be doing**


As a Senior Software Engineer at Coody, you’ll be working on challenging and fun assignments for companies that you can be proud to have worked with. You’ll be a key player in designing and building scalable, robust applications in cloud environments, while also contributing to areas like working methods, product strategy, and maintaining a great team spirit.


You’ll need to be adaptable and ready to jump headfirst into new environments. We’re all about embracing new challenges as opportunities to grow, so if you thrive in a dynamic setting, this is the place for you. Typically, you’ll work on 1-2 assignments per year.

##### **Who you are**


We’re looking for Software Engineers with **5+ years of experience** and a proven track record of delivering real results. If you’ve got the following, you’re probably a great fit:

* Experience building scalable software in cloud environments
* Expertise in at least one modern programming language like **TypeScript, JavaScript, Java, .Net, Golang, Kotlin, Rust, Ruby, Erlang / Elixir, Python (you get the idea)**, and related frameworks
* A degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, or something related
* **Based in Sweden** - You must have Swedish citizenship, a valid work visa, or permanent residency
* Fluent in English (spoken and written)

##### 
**How to apply**


Are you excited to take your career to the next level and meet the criterias? Apply now, and we'll be in touch shortly.

title: Senior utvecklare som kan det mesta
description:
Just nu söker vi en driven Fullstackutvecklare, med ett gäng års erfarenhet till oss på adesso Sweden.


Vi söker med det här ganska brett, då vi ser Fullstack som term som lite missvisande. Vi förutsätter att du har en stabil bakgrund och kunskap i backendutveckling, antingen i Java eller .NET (eller kanske båda). Du har också ett intresse och erfarenhet av frontendutveckling och även om CSS och UI inte är dina favoriter så hanterar du det. Att du med andra ord också är duktig på JavaScript eller TypeScript kommer som en självklarhet. Erfarenhet från diverse JS-ramverk som är coola för dagen är definitivt ett plus, men React, NodeJS, och ibland Angular är mer eller mindre ett krav.


I din roll kommer du bland annat att designa, utveckla och underhålla applikationer tillsammans med kunniga och engagerade kollegor och våra kunders utvecklingsteam. Oavsett, så sätter du alltid kundens bästa främst.

  

Som konsult hos adesso är uppdragen i princip alltid förlagda till de orter vi är representerade på eller i absolut närhet för att hålla pendling till ett minimum. Beroende på uppdrag är möjligheten att ”jobba hemifrån” alltid en option, även om vi tycker att det är grymt kul att träffa kollegorna på kontoret (som är både snyggt, roligt, homey och alltid placerat mitt i smeten) och gärna hänger tillsammans där. En av våra högsta prioriteringar är att du ska ha kul på jobbet - det är en av våra grundstenar.

 **Det här vill vi gärna att du har med dig till oss**

* 5+ års erfarenhet som Fullstackare (Java eller .NET samt JS)
* Erfarenhet av ett eller flera klassiska ramverk som t ex React, Spring osv
* Grymma problemlösningsfärdigheter och kommunikationskunskaper
* Erfarenhet av att jobba I ett agilt team
* Du måste vara flytande i både Svenska och Engelska i både tal och skrift.

**Det är även ett plus om du har koll på några av följande tekniker:**

  

* AWS Amazon Web Services
* Azure
* JEE
* SQL
* NoSQL
  

  

Så, vänta inte - hos oss får du chansen att jobba på en fantastisk och flexibel arbetsplats där vi satsar på våra anställda och ger dig möjligheten att bredda ditt CV och utveckla dina kunskaper ytterligare. In med din ansökan bara så hörs vi.

title: Senior .NET-utvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* Har ett genuint intresse för programmering och drivs av att förbättra användarupplevelsen för våra kollegor och kunder
* Har minst 10 års erfarenhet av professionell mjukvaruutveckling.
* Besitter goda kunskaper inom .NET | AzureDevOps 2022
* Besitter goda kunskaper i SQL och Rabbit MQ
* Har vana av att arbeta agilt (Scrum och/eller SAFe)
* Har tidigare erfarenhet från bank/ försäkring samt AML

  

  

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 25-06-2025 **Om Deploja**  

  

Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.  

  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?

 *Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Junior FPGA Developer
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------

 **About the Opportunity:**


Join our visionary team of ASIC, FPGA, and SoC engineers, united by a shared passion for shaping the future of mobile communication technology. Dedicated to delivering industry-leading ASIC and FPGA solutions, we are at the forefront of innovation, driving advancements for current and emerging standards, including 5G and 6G.  

  

Our mission is to craft cutting-edge, first-class HW solutions that empower the next generation of communication. Working in close collaboration with internal teams, standardization bodies, and specialized vendors, we strive to push the boundaries of technology and redefine what’s possible in connectivity.  

  

**What you will do:**

* Participate in FPGA design and verification, using the latest tools and methodologies.
* Work closely with a team of experts, leveraging collective knowledge to build industry-leading FPGA solutions. Engage with standardization teams and external partners to align designs with the latest mobile standards.
* Constantly seek ways to improve design processes, methodologies, and outcomes. We value your input and encourage you to share your ideas on how we can continue to innovate and work smarter.
* Build broad technical expertise in FPGA and SoC (System on Chip). As our team moves across different proficiency areas, you will have the opportunity to expand your skill set.
* Contribute to projects that will be integral to 5G rollouts, shaping the future of communication for both people and machines.


  

**Skills you bring:*** Master’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or a related field.
* Strong foundation in digital logic design, (VHDL/Verilog), and RTL design and verification methodologies.
* Ability to work effectively as part of a team, focusing on sharing knowledge and learning from others.
* Problem-solving: Strong analytical skills and a proactive approach to finding innovative solutions.
* We’re looking for someone passionate about FPGA devices and hands-on lab validation


  

 Please Note to attach your Transcripts, we need to see your grades. **What we offer:**

* Creative Freedom: From day one, you will have the freedom to create and innovate. We believe in empowering our engineers to take ownership of their work by providing support.
* Supportive Team Environment: You will never be alone in your efforts. Our team is here to back you up, provide guidance, and collaborate on overcoming challenges together.
* Continuous Learning: We are committed to continuous improvement, and we want you to grow with us. You will have opportunities to learn and develop your technical skills across a range of areas.
* Impactful Work: The solutions you help build will play a critical role in the future of communication technology. Join us in making a real difference.
**Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

**Primary country and city:** Sweden || Lund

 **Rafa Nadal Academy** 
 , our platform is transforming the sports world. With offices in Stockholm, Barcelona and the US, we’re looking for passionate, driven individuals to join our team as we continue to grow globally.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We’re looking for a creative and pragmatic
 **Web Developer** 
 to join our team and help build external websites for our global clients. This role is perfect for someone who is business minded and enjoys combining technical skills with customer interaction. A significant part of the role is meetings with clients to discuss layout, structure and needs – then translate those insights into a tailored website solution.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Build and maintain websites using CMS platforms (Duda)
* Use HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create responsive, user-friendly interfaces
* Work on integrating the 360Player platform with the website
* Participate in client meetings to understand their needs and translate them into web solutions
* Manage tasks and projects in a structured, efficient way
* Contribute to internal web development using Webflow and SEO efforts


**What We’re Looking For**
* 3–5 years of experience in web development and a relevant education in front-end/web design
* Solid skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
* Experience working in CMS platforms and a good eye for design
* Comfortable working with clients and understanding their needs
* Experience with task-based workflows, project ownership, and business thinking
* Experience with E-commerce is a plus
* Fluent in English, both spoken and written


**Personal Qualities**
* Confident and communicative
* Ability to communicate and understand customer needs
* Enjoys both client interaction and hands-on web development
* Service-minded and creative
* Business-oriented and solution-focused


**Why 360Player?**
* Be part of a fast-growing company with opportunities for advancement.
* Work with global clients on a wide range of web projects
* Flexible work environment with room for creativity and ownership
* Opportunity to shape both internal and external web experiences


**How To Apply**
 Excited about this opportunity? If you have a passion for web development. Apply with your resume, and a short cover letter explaining why you’re the right fit for this role. We review applications on a rolling basis – don’t wait to apply!

title: Backend Software Engineer
description:

 The Role

title: Software Developer
description:
Join a growing team at a leading SaaS company!
 



  
 



***Our Story***




*At BoardClic, we're on a mission to make sound corporate governance available to every organisation through smart and accessible technology. BoardClic was founded by boardroom experts and brought to life by a team of skilled developers who believe modern solutions will increase board effectiveness. We help boards and leadership teams move from outdated manual reviews to a digital, seamless way of working. Our platform enables easy assessment of board, CEO, and management performance, tracks alignment and collaboration, and facilitates action based on clear, data-driven insights. Everything is built on years of governance experience and behavioural science.* 




  





*Today, BoardClic is trusted by over 7,000 board members across 50 countries. Our clients are some of the most well-known listed companies, financial institutions, and investment firms in the Nordics. And, now that we’ve found a strong market fit, we’re entering a new growth phase. The commercial team is focused on expanding globally, while our product and tech teams are building with purpose, adding more value, improving quality, and streamlining internal and external processes.* 




  





**Role and responsibilities** 




 As a Software Developer at BoardClic, you'll be a valued member of the company’s growing product and tech team. This includes planning and implementing new features while also making sure our current ones continue to bring value to our customers.
 



  





 Your daily work will consist of both development of new features and maintenance of the platform. Our team works in cycles of a few weeks at a time and takes turns in initiating quality improvements in the platform. A core part of our workflow is code review, and we always strive for everyone's understanding as well as adherence to project guidelines. We encourage pair programming and test-driven development.
 



  





 Our platform is built as a full-stack application running Elixir and Phoenix, where we're happily using technologies such as Phoenix LiveView, Tailwind CSS and Livebook.
 



 Tools such as GitHub and Linear are our daily documentation tools.  
 



 We believe that you're someone who strives for improvement and enjoys seeing products come to life. Your curiosity makes you want to dig deeper, where a satisfying answer is the only way to quench your thirst. You'll become part of a supportive and enthusiastic team of developers and a designer, where collaboration is key. Our focus is to continue developing our world-class solution in existing and new markets. 
 



  





**Requirements:** 



* Fluency in English
* 3-5+ years of professional experience within a team of developers
* Professional experience with Elixir & Phoenix
* Consider yourself to be able to handle a full stack
* Experience with PostgreSQL or a similar relational database
* Basic knowledge of processes around GitHub (PR-workflows)
* Experience with TDD



  





**Additional skills that we value:** 



* Fluency in Swedish
* Contributions to open source
* Professional experience with Phoenix Live View and Tailwind CSS
* Experience with data analysis and machine learning
* Experience or interest with using AI orchestration



  





 This is a full-time position where you have the possibility to work in our unique Stockholm office – with a beautiful view over Djurgården and the city centre – and the flexibility to work hybrid. 
 



  





 We can’t wait to see what you’ll bring to the team.

title: Senior C# Developer
description:
**About The Role**
 We are looking for a BE-heavy Fullstack Developer to help shape the future of Wisentics core platform Arbit - a system that helps insurance companies, and their customers, manage administrative processes within claims handling, auto glass claims, and pet insurance more efficiently. You will be instrumental in driving the technical development, making key design decisions, and helping in reducing legacy while building a sustainable, future-proof SaaS product.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Here, you’ll play a key role in taking Arbit to the next level. As part of a small development team, you’ll help create solutions that truly make an impact — both for today’s users and for the future.
* Design, develop, and maintain backend systems using .NET 8 and newer versions.
* Collaborate with the development team to make informed technical decisions and lead modernization initiatives.
* Enhance balance by integrating new features into existing systems.
* Engage with product and business teams to understand customer needs and deliver impactful solutions.
* Reduce technical debt and contribute to establishing a scalable, maintainable architecture.


**About You**
 We are looking for a proactive and solution-oriented individual who:
   

  

* Has extensive experience in .NET/C# backend development, preferably within SaaS and microservices environments.
* Is comfortable working across the full stack and open to engaging with frontend technologies like Angular.
* Possesses experience with cloud platforms, with a preference for Azure.
* Can independently break down complex user stories and lead technical initiatives.
* Is curious, eager to learn, and stays updated on modern technology trends.


 What we offer
   

  

 Wisentic is a SaaS scale-up with more than 30 years of experience in the auto, pet and health claims space. We have proven products and are now expanding into new markets while continuously improving our delivery and experience.
   

  

* Opportunity to work in a dynamic growth company.
* Talented colleagues ready to support the success in your career path.
* Social events with your colleagues (breakfast, candy-time, afterwork etc.).
* Wellness allowance.
* Hybrid working model and the flexibility to work three days from the office and two days remote.

title: Developer - .NET
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
****Essential requirements:****
* Strong experience in .NET Core (version 8 or later)


 Demonstrates proficiency in the core development framework used for the role.
   

  

* Proficient in C# programming


 Essential for backend development and integration tasks.
   

  

* Experience with Kubernetes


 Key for managing containerized applications in a cloud-native environment.
   

  

* Fluency in Swedish and English


 Required for effective communication within cross-functional teams and stakeholders.
   

  

* Great communication skills and team collaboration ability


 Vital for working effectively in a newly formed, cross-functional team.
   

  

**Meritorious:**
* Experience with GitHub Actions


 Valuable for automating CI/CD workflows and improving development efficiency.
   

  

* Familiarity with MongoDB


 Helpful for working with non-relational databases in the new application.
   

  

* Interest in Test-Driven Development (TDD) and Behavior-Driven Development (BDD)


 Indicates a quality-focused development mindset.
   

  

* Capability to take ownership of applications and drive long-term maintainability


 Reflects initiative and responsibility beyond day-to-day coding tasks.
   

  

* Experience in the banking sector.


**Last day to apply** 
 : 23-06-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Frontend Platform Engineer
description:
*Nordnet redefined the financial world as the first digital bank in Europe. Now we are about to do it again and the aim is to create the next generation of bank, in the cloud. We know that this requires great people, great teams, and great technology. Do you want to join us and build the new Nordnet?*
**In brief**
 At Nordnet we want to democratize savings and investments by giving our customers access to the best tools and information whether you are a professional investor or a small saver. With modern technologies and speed of delivery we are building the next generation investment platform.
   

  

**This is part of the role**
 Nordnet is a company with tech as the primary focus. In our agile and autonomous teams, you will be working with engaged colleagues that love to share their knowledge. As a developer at Nordnet you will have the possibility to make an impact and create value to our customers with continuous releases several times a day.
   

  

**This is you**
 To thrive in this role, we believe that you love to contribute to a state-of-the-art developer experience and to work on improving and modernizing our frontend technology stack. You can easily connect with people, have a solution-oriented mindset and are happy to help and support others.
   

  

**As a Frontend Platform Engineer, You**
* Find developer experience important and like to contribute to it
* Work with modern JavaScript (ES6+), CSS, HTML, TypeScript, NextJS, ReactJS, NodeJS, Jest/Vitest
* Have experience of or interested in learning GCP, Nginx, Docker, Kubernetes, ArgoCD, GitHub actions & Terraform
* Gets motivated when faced with complex technical problems
* Like to be part of setting the architecture for the future
* Love to automate things


**Nordnetters**
* Are proud of the friendly and humble environment
* Believe that the best code is written together and therefore appreciate pair/mob programming
* Continuously improving to ensure quality, making the code better with every release
* Commit to our goals as a team, sharing the responsibility, success and failure


**What We Offer**
* Experienced team which build own products and support other teams and products
* Your expertise and contribution will be appreciated from day one
* Plenty of opportunities to grow as an engineer
* Competitive salary and compensation
* Flexible work setup (from office or hybrid)


 We offer you the opportunity to work in a Nordic environment with a strong focus on delivery, product development and technology. Our ambitions are high and you will embark on a fast and challenging journey together with a skillful team of sharp and committed colleagues. We are embracing the agile way of working. Culture is built and cared for, each day by everyone. We’re proud of ours. Having a flat organization where anyone can talk to anyone creates a warm and friendly atmosphere worth protecting. We believe in a culture where every effort counts and where everyone is being recognized. A culture embracing our core values – passion, simplicity and transparency on all levels, no matter who you are or what you do.We are over 900 employees in Stockholm, Oslo, Helsinki and Copenhagen. Visit us on: www.nordnetab.com
   

  

**Questions & applications**
 Apply today – we will start interviewing immediately. Please note that we do only accept applications through our recruitment system, hence no email applications will be considered. We want to inform you that Nordnet conducts mandatory credit and background checks, as well as drug testing as a part of our recruitment process.
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your application!

title: Backend Developer
company_industry: Telecommunications and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
PAY TV is a key strategic area within Telia Company, and we’re investing significantly in building the next generation of streaming solutions. If you’re excited about working on a product with massive reach and real impact, this is the place for you. Your work will touch the lives of over one million customers across the Nordics.
   

  

**As a Backend Developer in the Streaming team…**
 You will play a vital role in making sure everything just works when a user hits the “Play” button. From processing playback requests to ensuring our end-to-end streaming pipeline runs reliably and efficiently, you'll help deliver smooth, high-quality TV experiences to millions of viewers across the Nordics. You’ll be working on a large-scale platform, continuously building new functionality within a modern microservices architecture. Our microservices run in Amazon EKS (Elastic Kubernetes Service), enabling us to scale with confidence while delivering consistent performance. Our apps run on all major device platforms — mobile, tablets, PCs, Apple TV, Chromecast — through our flagship service, Telia Play.
   

  

 In this cloud-native environment, you’ll collaborate with talented engineers, designers, and product owners to solve real-world challenges that directly influence how and what people watch every day. Whether it’s scaling our platform, enhancing performance, or integrating with world-class content providers, your contributions will be key to our success. We value proactive team players who care deeply about code quality, reliability, and the end-user experience. You’ll have the freedom to grow, experiment, and share your ideas. If you’re passionate about solving complex problems and want your code to make someone’s evening just a little better — this is the role for you.
   

  

**Who We're Looking For...**
 We're looking for someone with over 5 years of professional experience in Java, particularly in developing distributed systems and microservices. You should have solid experience working in cloud-native environments, and hands-on knowledge of Spring Boot, AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, and Terraform (Infrastructure as Code). Experience running services in Amazon EKS is a strong plus. You are professionally proficient in English and a strong collaborator within cross-functional teams. Most importantly, you have a curious mindset and are eager to learn, share, and continuously improve — both personally and as part of a team.
   

  

**We are more than a workplace**
 Join our inclusive team and collaborate with over 16,500 talented colleagues from around the globe. Recognized as a Climate Leader in the Nordics and Baltics, we're passionate about creating great products and delivering extraordinary customer experiences while always prioritizing sustainability. We believe our people are our most valuable asset, ensuring everyone feels welcome and valued. When you join us, you'll receive a comprehensive benefits package tailored to your local market, opportunities for remote work, and more. You'll also have the chance to earn a bonus based on your performance and Telia's results. If you want to make a real impact, this is the place where you belong.
   

  

*(Only applicable for applicants in Lithuania: Monthly salary range for this position: 4290 - 6435 EUR before tax deduction.)*
**Ready to make better happen?**
 We’re looking forward to your application no later than 2025-06-31. Please apply through our recruitment system to ensure your data is handled securely - we’re unable to accept applications via email. Background checks will be conducted as part of the hiring process.
   

  

 Got questions? Reach out to me, Björn Balldin, at bjorn.balldin@teliacompany.com.
   

  

**Join us — and let’s make better happen, together!**

title: Gaming- Senior .NET Engineer
description:

The Gaming Area at Betsson Group focuses on Game Play and Game Discovery across all our brands and markets. We aim to offer the best gaming products in the industry and an exciting user experience when playing on our sites. We cover game lobbies, gaming initiatives, provider integrations and more.

 Previous experience as a backend developer and relevant experience with some of the core technical skills mentioned below. You are a collaborative person who readily offers help and shares knowledge with your colleagues.

title: Software Engineer (Machine Learning)
description:
*At Lendo, Scandinavia’s largest marketplace for loans, we are on a mission to empower people to make smarter financial decisions. Our digital customer experience is powered by data & AI, helping users navigate complex financial choices with confidence.*
 We are looking for a software engineer with a strong interest in machine learning to join our data & ML team. You will play a crucial role in building and owning our ML platform, integrating ML into production systems (we have already done a lot of that), and ensuring reliable and robust ML applications across multiple environments and markets. You will be offered a unique possibility to partake in creating an ML platform to serve multiple use cases and markets with a strong value-driven and business-centric approach.
   

  

 We value people who are solution-oriented, result-oriented, genuinely care about the things they are building, take a lot of ownership, and are collaborative. If you tick these boxes and have a strong background in software engineering, knowledge of or willingness to learn more about ML, and want to be part of a dynamic team that is making a difference, we encourage you to apply.
   

  

**Why join us?**
* Make a difference. You will be a part of a highly competent and result-driven team in a fast-paced fintech company where data is at the heart of everything we do. You will not just deploy models, you will see your work translate directly into measurable business value. At Lendo, you will be able to say, “I made that happen” when our ML solutions drive better decisions for users and create growth for the company.
* Freedom with responsibility. We believe in trusting great engineers. You will have high ownership, real autonomy, and the space to shape your own approach, backed by a team that values accountability and collaboration. You will work in an environment that gives you room to experiment, learn, and grow.
* Work across the data spectrum. You will collaborate daily with other software engineers, data scientists, and data engineers, giving you exposure to multiple facets of the ML lifecycle. This is a great opportunity to deepen your expertise or broaden your skills across disciplines.
* Hybrid setup, global culture. Join a welcoming, international company with colleagues from 20+ nationalities. Our flexible setup combines the best of in-person collaboration with the freedom of remote work. On top of that, we offer competitive salaries.


**What You Will Do**
* Take end-to-end ownership of our ML platform, ensuring it is scalable, secure, and reliable across multiple markets.
* Design, maintain, and optimize production-ready machine learning applications, including integrating ML applications into our microservices architecture.
* Use modern tech such as Kubernetes, Docker, PostgreSQL, GCP, CI/CD.
* Collaborate with data scientists and other engineers deliver ML-driven features.
* Implement best practices in monitoring, testing, and versioning for ML models.
* Support the team in handling complex technical environments across different markets.

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description:
**Paf stands out from other gaming companies in the market – and not just because of what we do, but
 *why* 
 we do it.** 
 Founded by the Red Cross, Save the Children, Public Health on Åland, and the foundation Dagens Barn, our mission from day one has been to generate funds for the benefit of society.
   

  

 We’re proud to be an award-winning industry leader in responsible gaming – raising the bar and setting new standards that put players first. All our profit goes to charity, and we strive for a long-term sustainable business that care about our employees, customers, and society at large.
   

  

 Now, we’re looking for a skilled
 **Senior Frontend Developer** 
 to strengthen our growing frontend team.
   

  

 THE TEAM & ROLE
   

  

 You’ll join a talented and skilled team, known for their collaborative mindset and passion for high-quality code. The team values clean architecture, thoughtful problem-solving, and open knowledge sharing - everyone contributes, and everyone’s voice matters.
   

  

 The team is responsible for the whole stack from Cloudflare, through React applications and API servers (Backend For Frontend), down to the infrastructure in AWS.
   

  

 In this role, you’ll work across the entire development lifecycle - from idea and planning to implementation, deployment, and continuous improvement.
   

  

 YOUR PROFILE
   

  

 You are curious, driven, and love building great user experiences. You take initiative but are also a strong team player who communicates clearly and asks for help when needed.
   

  

**We believe you have:**
* 5+ years of experience working with React
* Professional experience with TypeScript


**Bonus if you also bring:**
* API design skills with GraphQL and REST
* Experience with headless CMS (like Sanity)
* Familiarity with Redis or similar technologies
* Hands-on cloud experience, especially with AWS


 WE OFFER
   

  

* A company with steady, purposeful growth since 1966
* A workplace that values creativity, autonomy, and wellbeing
* Generous remote work options and support for your home setup
* Occupational healthcare and insurance
* A culture that prioritizes long-term success over short-term stress - overtime is something rare at Paf.


 WORK SETUP
   

  

**In Sweden** 
 : Choose your working location - 100% remote, hybrid, or office-based. Offices in Stockholm and Norrköping.
   

  

**In Mariehamn (Åland Islands)** 
 : Hybrid/remote, with 3 days per week in our beautiful, modern HQ. Enjoy weekly breakfasts, seminars, massage, an office gym, and more.
   

  

 PRACTICAL INFO
   

  

**Start** 
 : As soon as possible, depending on notice perio
   

  

**Type** 
 : Full-time, permanent with a 6-month probation period
   

  

**Location** 
 : Sweden or Mariehamn
   

  

**Application** 
 : Via our web form only (GDPR compliance)
   

  

**Recruitment Process** 
 : Includes a programming assignment, followed by tech interviews and a meeting with the hiring manager
   

  

 We review applications continuously and close the process as soon as we’ve found the right person.

title: Integration Developer
company_industry: Technology, Information and Media and Information Services
description:
**Job Title: Integration Developer** 




**Rate: Negotiable** 




**Location: Solna Onsite** 




**Duration: 12 months + chance of extensions** 




**Language: English Fluent** 









**Job Description:** 








 We are looking for a integration developer that can support us in the work with customer projects. This means you will be assisting in setting up integrations through or integration layer based on customer demands but with best-practise in mind.
 



 You will not do development on a daily basis, however, good Java skills is a must in order to use our reusable components in the best way. To summarize the role it is: 40% communication, 40% configuration, 10% testing and 10% Java development.
 







**Requirements** 
 :
 






* 2-4 years of hands-on experience with API Management and/or Apache Kafka
* 2-4 years of experience in Java
* Hands-on experience with PostgreSQL.
* Proficiency in GitHub Actions and Ansible Tower for automation.
* Hands-on experience with Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) with a strong understanding of Kubernetes clusters.
* Familiarity with Linux and WSL environments.
* Knowledge of Splunk, Fluent Bit, and Helm charts.
* Experience in Angular, JavaScript and Bash scripting is a plus

title: Software Engineer Stockholm
description:
**Job Title**
 Software Engineer Stockholm
   

  

**Job Description**
*At Axis, we’ve always been about pushing the boundaries in pursuit of innovating for a smarter, safer world. We do this by developing IP-based products and innovations for security and video surveillance. After a successful start last spring with the opening of our new Stockholm office, we are excited to expand our team. We’re looking for an* 
*experienced Firmware Engineer* 
*to help us develop more network tech innovations. Don’t miss out on the opportunity to join us at the forefront of our new and expanding site!*
**Who is your future team?**
 We develop products with significant innovation possibilities to meet market demands. The portfolio includes multidirectional cameras, panoramic cameras and modular cameras.
   

  

 Our most important asset is our ability to cooperate. If you are a person that likes to get involved, make a difference, and nudge the world a little bit in the right direction, you will feel at home with us.
   

  

**What You´ll Do As An Experienced Firmware Engineer**
 You will play an essential role in the development of our new products. You will work together in teams with other dedicated software engineers, from all parts of the embedded Linux stack in our network video products.
   

  

 The daily work can be anything from being a part of our development projects to analyzing, designing to troubleshooting and solving issues wherever they are, from Linux kernel drivers to applications.
   

  

**Who are you?**
 You are curious, have a great passion for technology, love challenges and enjoy solving them in a team-focused atmosphere.
   

  

 You also have relevant education in engineering (bachelor’s or master’s degree level), experience with C and/or C++ programming, Linux system programming, user space, kernel space and device drivers.
   

  

**What Axis have to offer:**
 This is a unique opportunity to be part of building our new R&D office in Stockholm. On one hand, having the advantages of being a small and agile site while at the same time being part of an exciting, successful organization that is already the world leader in network video.
   

  

 We want you to enjoy working with us, and we offer benefits such as flexible working hours, morning coffee every day, Friday cake, company bonus, attractive wellness benefits, health insurance and your very own Axis bicycle - to name a few.
   

  

**Curious to discover more?**
 We have a host of places where you can learn more about Axis; our products and solutions, our company culture, and what working at Axis is really like. Check out:
   

  

 Life at Axis blog
   

  

 Engineering at Axis blog
   

  

 Innovation at Axis
   

  

**Ready to Act?**
 Join us! We go through applications continuously so don't wait - apply today!
   

  

 Type of Employment
   

  

 Permanent Employment
   

  

 Posting End Date
   

  

 2025-06-30
   

  

*Certain roles at Axis require background checks, which means applicable verifications will be done in these recruitments.* 
*Notice will be provided before we take any action.*
**About Axis Communications**
 We enable a smarter, safer world by creating innovative solutions for improving security and business performance. As a network technology company and industry leader, we offer solutions in video surveillance, access control, intercom, and audio systems, enhanced by intelligent analytics applications.
   

  

 With around 5000 committed employees in over 50 countries, we collaborate with partners worldwide. Together, we thrive in our friendly, open, and collaborative culture and inspire each other to think beyond the expected. United by our commitment to inclusion, diversity, and sustainability, we consistently seek to develop our skills and way of working.
   

  

**Let´s create a smarter, safer world**
 For more information about Axis, please visit our website www.axis.com.
   

  

 Listen to Get To Know Axis – Podcast

title: .NET Developer
description:

 Our IT Delivery Center aims to build strong and sustainable solutions for customers across Europe. We are looking for a
 **.NET Developer** 
 to join the team to build, support, and drive customer innovations—bringing efficiency to the processes through effective management of cost and schedule.
   

  

 In alignment with Avigna’s values, we are committed to providing an inclusive work environment for all employees to positively impact our culture every day.

 Relevant experience as a backend .NET Developer

 Stockholm

 100%

 AVIGNA holds Service authorization for SAP S/4 HANA and SAP Business All in one.
